One of the best games I've ever played.  It is very story rich and kept me captivated throughout.  Controls are tight and it is an entertaining time all around.  Graphics still look good and some of the scenery is breath taking - it is a very beautiful game

I would recommend getting the Burial at Sea DLCs as well because they are very good and are worth the extra money.
A very good game! and Burial at Sea is a great DLC

what can I say, this was a great video game. And that ending :O woooooooooooooooowwwwwwww

bilgisayarÄ±m Ã§Ã¶p ama yÃ¼ksek grafiklerde kaldÄ±rÄ±yo bence alÄ±n ve ikide bir indirim oluyo

A complete horrible mess compared to the original two. Any one who sits and complains two was terrible has no story or is bad, never can give a reason why. However I have many reasons why not to buy this game.

1: Story is a short, yet drags on, mess
2: Booker is okay but once you find out the ending, whats the point in caring about him
3: Elizabeth could be removed from the game after you save her, and other than forced scripts she would be useless gameplay-wise
4: They touched Bioshock 1's story for no reason
5: They ruined the interesting aspects of pre Bioshock 1 rapture, for no reason
6: Looks like a crappy unity game
7: 2 guns at once
8: Guns are all lame and uncreative
9: It's like COD
10: Vigors are bland
11: See all the good tactics needed in 1 and 2, screw them, all you need now is your boom boom stick
12: Isn't anything close to the original trailers
13: The fanbase for Infinite is the worst
14: It is just a bland, boring game

If you enjoy Infinite, go ahead. But the fanbase will tear you to shreds for saying you don't like it.

Unless you want a more artistic looking COD game, don't buy this.
Just As Good As Bioshock 1 And 2 Whatever High Standards You Have For Them, This Will Live Up To Them!

Just great.Some game - just like a good book or a film?Amazing.Fantasticly fantastic.U will go back to play it - it will stay in Your memory - it`s not just an another - very good or very very good fpps - it`s one of the best ever made.
pretty nice. Bioshock 1 was the MVP tho.

Pros: Edwardian fashion. Baptism. Guns. Timey Wimey, wibbly wobbly. Plasmids (But not called plasmids). Errol Flynn. Classism and Social Darwinism. Glory Kills.

Cons: You may stay up way too late playing it. Some fights will drag on FOREVERRRR when looking for the last hostile dudman.
Amazing story and very fun combat. Highly recommend. Absolute classic. Shit's electric

No esperaba menor de esta franchise, la historia es demasiado buena, cuesta entenderla, pero hay que estar al tanto de todos los detalles, el apartado armas y tonicos, a mi parecer un poco incompletos, faltaron mas ranuras para sostener armas, ya que se vuelve un poco tedioso tirar una para agarra otra, lo mismo por los tonicos, por el resto, es un juego que vale la pena jugar, en historia, es mejor que el 1 (que a mi parecer es el mejor de todos) pero en apartado de jugabilidad, se quedo atras.
